alert.note: Alert for Clay; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued March 05 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: This hydrologic outlook includes the following river in Illinois: Little Wabash River... The following river information is based on future predicted rainfall, with between 1.5 and 2 inches of rainfall forecast over the Little Wabash river valley for Sunday night. The exact amount, intensity, timing, and location of the rain that will occur is still uncertain. These outlook stages are provided to show what may be expected if the forecast precipitation occurs. Once there is more certainty about the river forecasts, a flood warning or statement will be issued if the threat materializes. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 AM Location Stg Stg Day Time Sun Mon Tue Little Wabash River Clay City 18 9.8 Sat 8 AM 9.0 12.6 19.2
